mapper.insert: insert into tags_statistics (id, uid, bruteforce, greedy, math, data_structure, graphs, dp, cf_problem, upd_time) value (#{id},#{uid},#{bruteforce},#{greedy},#{math},#{dataStructure},#{graphs},#{dp},#{cfProblem},now());
mapper.update: update tags_statistics set math = #{math},greedy = #{greedy},graphs = #{graphs},data_structure = #{dataStructures}, bruteforce = #{bruteforce},dp = #{dp},cf_problem = #{cfProblem},upd_time = now() where uid = #{uid}
